thread.title: Russell JD
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Russell JD

author: Russell JD
title: Russell JD
text:
Portable design, light weight, easy to carry and convenient to use.
7 inch large touch screen.
HD screen 800*480.
Support GPS, FM, Game, Ebook, USB, Flash, Video Play.
USB/TF card port.
OSD Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, etc.
GPS map card suit to TF card.
Specifications:
System
External Memory: Up to 32GB/TF Card
Features: GPS, FM, Game, Ebook, USB, Flash
Screen Size: 7 inch touch screen
Screen Resolution: 800*480
OSD languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, etc.
Media Type: MP3/AVI/WMV/MP4/TXT/JPG
GPS
Operating System: Windows CE 6.0
System RAM: 128M
ROM: 4G
GPS Satellite Channel: 66 channels(location search) 22 channels (tracking)
